description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission ref: 216832FUL dated 11/10/2022 for: Demolition of existing building and erection of industrial/warehouse unit (Class E(g)(iii), Class B2 and/or B8 uses) with ancillary office space and associated car, HGV and cycle parking, fencing, gates and landscaping. Amendment seeks re-introduction of a substation with ancillary transformer and metering cabinet on the site frontage, and associated changes to landscaping.
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

Rev P09: Block Plan; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0102 REV P02: Existing Site Layout; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0106 REV P01: Existing Elevations; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0107 REV P01: Existing Roof Plan; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0103  REV P12: Proposed Site Layout; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0104 REV P09: Proposed Office Plans; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0105  REV P08: Proposed Elevations; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0108 REV P06: Proposed Roof Plan; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0109  REV P08: Proposed Site Sections; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0110 REV P06: Proposed Building Plan ; JSL4071_100 REV E: Landscape Strategy Plan; JSL4071_501 REV E: Detailed Planting Plan 1 of 2; JSL4071_502 REV E: Detailed Planting Plan 2 of 2; JSL4071_550 REV D: Typical Trees and Shrub Palette
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
